website_summaries.verdict: Lift the top to reveal a hidden storage area, plus you can use the lifted surface as a multi-purpose work top.
pros: A highly functional, durable, and quality design
High-quality  wood gives you an even finish all over
Has an attractive rustic farmhouse look
The assembly instructions are easy to follow
cons: Some users report part of the lift mechanism doesn't fit correctly, but this seems to be a fault with a minority of units

customer_reviews.title: Cute but missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Really love this piece of furniture, it is a bit wobbly though and was missing a few parts, 2 of the legs came split but tried to make it work by gluing it but not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, rustic farmhouse coffee table
customer_reviews.text: I do like this coffee table. It looks good in my living room which is blue and gray. Good storage capacity. I can't comment on the ease of assembly as my husband put it together.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: a lot of times these things come with terrible instructions. This came with great instructions
customer_reviews.text: a lot of times these things come with terrible instructions. This came with great instructions. Easy to put together. Works great. We love it. We've had it for over a month and enjoying all it's features.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Theel

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Putting it together took a little time but once it was assembled, it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline McClintock

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but slightly damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Wasn't that hard to assemble, but two people are needed for the last few steps. 4 stars because the main table top piece was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Love love love my table
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. I did most of it myself. When you put the top on you need two people. I love my table and the way it pops up like a TV tray for eating on the coach.
customer_reviews.author: Shana L Swigert

customer_reviews.title: Poor boxing and shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a sturdy and great product. Box and shipping was not good. Box damaged and the under side of the flip top broken. Super disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality !
customer_reviews.text: This table is absolutely amazing. It is very sturdy, durable and just what I was looking for. My husband’s grandmother loved it so much we bought her one too !!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Moore

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: One of the screw holes for the handle was not tapped/threaded for the screw. Still works and looks okay, but that was frustrating and inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Laurelle Buller

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I like it, it looks great! I paid someone to put it together since I was working away from home. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this table
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! I have gotten many compliments on it. My only "complaint" is that it takes two people to put it together - I did almost everything on my own except for the top. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A Brown

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The storage area is great for college students. It’s sturdy and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece!
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit confusing to assemble but once you get it done, you will not regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Granados

customer_reviews.title: Great product, wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Was super easy to put together. My wife did it and she did a great job. After she was done she asked why it didn't match our tv stand and it was then when I pulled off shipping label we noticed they sent us the white not grey. I like it either way.
customer_reviews.author: Christine R

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality- just opened box to a bunch of holes and poor quality boards
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Needs better hardware
customer_reviews.text: Pros: good packaging, good appearance, modern look. Cons: cheap hardware, some hardware was broken, a bit tedious to assemble. Overall, I think the value exceeds the price that was paid for it, so it's a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Bil

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece.
customer_reviews.text: Giving it three stars because the piece I was missing when i received it. Piece missing is the cross piece for the table
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

product_meta.title: Better Homes and Gardens Modern Farmhouse Top Lifts up and Forward Coffee Table, Rustic Gray Finish (Table, Rustic Gray)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars31 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
